com.googlecode.lanterna.gui
Class Theme

java.lang.Object
  com.googlecode.lanterna.gui.Theme

public class Theme
extends Object

Extend this class to create your own themes. A Theme consists of several Theme.Definitions, one for each Theme.Category value. When components are setting their colors according to the theme, they do so by calling TextGraphics.applyTheme.

Author:
Martin

Nested Class Summary
static class Theme.Category
          Represents things which can be styled.
static class Theme.Definition
          A style definition encompassing colors and effects.
